body_html: @d4I3k I've submitted a change internally to fix building with NDK r13+, should show up in the next push to github. I think right now r14b is the recommended NDK for bazel, but I also tested with r15c and that seems to work fine as well.
body_text: @d4I3k I've submitted a change internally to fix building with NDK r13+, should show up in the next push to github. I think right now r14b is the recommended NDK for bazel, but I also tested with r15c and that seems to work fine as well.
body: @d4I3k I've submitted a change internally to fix building with NDK r13+, should show up in the next push to github. I think right now r14b is the recommended NDK for bazel, but I also tested with r15c and that seems to work fine as well.
